snippet.title: Tiny Thor - Release Date Teaser | Hammer Time!
snippet.description:
Tiny Thor is almost ready to leave the gates of Asgard behind. The game releases on June 05 on PC, with a Switch release following later this summer. Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/541310/Tiny_Thor/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=announcement

This 16-bit platformer is a perfect blend of old-school gameplay and modern mechanics, featuring tight controls and fast-paced action. Mjölnir can be used to ricochet off surfaces and defeat enemies in creative ways, as well as solve environmental puzzles. Use it to explore over 30 handcrafted levels across three different realms, each with its own set of challenging, nefarious bosses. Also available in:

Epic Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/tiny-thor-76de1f
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/tiny_thor

Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/pJnpaJagKv

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://facebook.com/IndieForge
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/indieforgetv
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GF_IndieForge
